title: Olive Harvesting with a Tree Shaker - Jared Gulian

tasks.task: Loading hay into a horse's trailer
subtasks: Approach the hay shed
Grasp bales of hay and pick them up
Carry hay bales towards the trailer
Open the trailer doors
Align the hay with the trailer’s loading ramp
Place hay bales onto the trailer
Secure the hay to prevent shifting during transport

tasks.task: Attaching the horse to the trailer
subtasks: Approach the horse's stall or holding area
Lead the horse to the trailer
Open the trailer's side or rear gate
Assist the horse into the trailer, using a halter or lead
Secure the horse inside the trailer

tasks.task: Driving the horse-drawn trailer to a parking location
subtasks: Buckle up the seatbelt
Start the truck engine
Back the truck into the parking area
Park the truck in a suitable spot

tasks.task: Unloading hay from the trailer at the destination
subtasks: Approach the unloading area
Open the trailer doors
Grasp hay bales from the trailer and pick them up
Carry hay bales to the destination location
Arrange the hay bales in the designated area

tasks.task: Unsecuring the horse from the trailer
subtasks: Ascend into the trailer
Loosen the horse's securement
Assist the horse to exit the trailer
Guide the horse down the trailer steps
Lead the horse to a safe area
Lead the horse to the stall
Remove the halter and lead line
Water and feed the horse
Clean the stall or provide bedding
Attach the halter to the horse
Mount the horse or lead with a lead line
Walk the horse around the fields or paddock
Check the trailer's condition for damage
Look for necessary maintenance or repairs
